TopicTitle: Strong Physics impulse when extracting landing gear.

Articles.Content:
Version 0.1.1.0.21572

My vessel is in orbit around minmus, but orbit lines don't show.
My PE an AP are both around 16km.
When I toggle the landing gear, my Periapsis suddenly dropped to -2km.
I can do this repeatedly, each time the periapsis drops several kilometers.

My Vessel is quite lightweight:
